name: 21.11-Khmer: Filter-abund
description: Trim sequences at a minimum k-mer abundance

parameters.name: Presence table input
parameters.description: The input k-mer presence table filename

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: Output the trimmed sequences into a single file with the given filename instead of creating a new file for each input file

parameters.name: Tables
parameters.description: number of k-mer counting tables to use

parameters.name: Min table size
parameters.description: lower bound on tablesize to use

parameters.name: Cutoff
parameters.description: Trim at k-mers below this abundance

parameters.name: Normalize
parameters.description: Base the variable-coverage cutoff on this median k-mer abundance

parameters.name: Help
parameters.description: Only trim low-abundance k-mers from sequences that have high coverage

parameters.name: Help
parameters.description: Show the help message and exit
